text:
Be Informed:

💊Yes, #chloroquine has antiviral effects on SARS-CoV in vitro

💊Guess what?

💊Chloroquine and #hydroxychloroquine also has antiviral effects on SARS-CoV-2 in vitro

💊In vitro describes work that’s performed #outside of a living organism

💊Are you a single cell? https://t.co/0OBbXJnDR6 https://t.co/vwnx1tOyuu
